intro: Xamesike deltifolia, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to East Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its velvety, dark green leaves and showy, tubular flowers. Xamesike deltifolia is also valued for its ornamental beauty and ease of care.
